```
virtualenv ansible-4.3
source ansible-4.3/bin/activate
pip install 'ansible>=4.3,<4.4'
ansible --version
```

```
masterybook/
|-- demo
    |-- README.md
    |-- docs
    |-- galaxy.yml
    |-- plugins
        |-- README.md
    |-- roles
```

```
masterybook/
|-- demo
    |-- README.md
    |-- docs
    |-- galaxy.yml
    |-- plugins
        |-- modules
            |-- remote_copy.py
        |-- README.md
    |-- roles
```

```
mkdir collection-test
cd collection-test
mkdir collections
```

```
---
- name: test remote_copy module
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - name: ensure foo
    ansible.builtin.file:
      path: /tmp/rcfoo
      state: touch
  - name: do a remote copy
    masterybook.demo.remote_copy:
      source: /tmp/rcfoo
      dest: /tmp/rcbar
```

```
ansible-galaxy collection publish ~/masterybook/demo/masterybook-demo-1.0.0.tar.gz --token=<API key goes here>
```

```
---
collections:
- name: geerlingguy.k8s
- name: geerlingguy.php_roles
  version: 1.0.0
```

```
--- 
- name: demo the template 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false  
  vars: 
    setting: a_val 
    feature: 
      enabled: true
    another_setting: b_val  
  tasks: 
    - name: pause with render 
      pause: 
        prompt: "{{ lookup('template', 'demo.j2') }}"
```

```
---
- name: test remote_copy module
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  collections:
    - masterybook.demo
  tasks:
  - name: ensure foo
    ansible.builtin.file:
      path: /tmp/rcfoo
      state: touch
  - name: do a remote copy
    remote_copy:
      source: /tmp/rcfoo
      dest: /tmp/rcbar
```
